HiddenText.Name: CE summer session Q13
HiddenText.OpenningText: When is the last day to drop a credit class?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: See theÂ BYU-Idaho Academic Schedule for drop deadlines. After deadlines have passed, you must petition by writing a letter to the Division of Continuing Education explaining the extenuating circumstances. Students WILL NOT be automatically dropped from a class if they fail to attend.
